title: Queer's Progress
description: A compelling story of young love, narrated by Edward, Cuban-born and page at the New York Public Library (just a page, not a whole book or anything), handsome, charming, and reeking of sex. Ned joins in the narration after Andrew, new in town, falls in love with Edward at first sight, but seeks help from the master of gay Manhattan. Andrew makes his stumbling progress through gay New York, pushed and pulled by Edward and Ned.
author: Steven Key Meyers
